title: Corporate Card
para1: The Corporate Card is an item with a single use: To link unlinked machines to your Corporation. To do this, simply follow these steps:
para2: 1. If your card is unlinked (freshly crafted), go to a MegaCorp Uplink that is already linked to the desired MegaCorp, and insert the card into the slot on its Gui. This will link the card.
para3: 2. With the Corporate Card in your hand, go to the unlinked machine and right click on it.
para4: Note: A machine may only ever be linked to a single corporation. If linked to the wrong corporation, you will need to break and re-place it in order to try again.
para5: Note: Not all machines need linking. If a machine needs linking, its Gui will only show a message stating as much.
